title: Compiler: thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```
thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "read_option: expected 0 for None or 1 for Some"', libcore/result.rs:1009:5

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.30.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C linker=/[elided]/bin/clang -C incremental -C link-arg=--target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -C opt-level=z -C link-arg=--sysroot=/[elided]/linux-x64/sysroot --crate-type lib
```
